hr.header: Voditelj zbirke:\nIvan Smoljan, kustos\nUvid u zbirku: po najavi
hr.content: Fundus zbirke datira od 19. do 21. stoljeća. Najveći dio zbirke čine predmeti poštanskog prometa: dopisnice, omotnice i poštanske marke iz razdoblja austrijske i talijanske vladavine te razdoblja Jugoslavije. Osim toga, u zbirci se nalazi i nekoliko metalnih poštanskih sandučića iz kraja 19. i početka 20. stoljeća te kartonske kutije za poštansku dostavu, također s početka 20. stoljeća.\n\nUnutar zbirke svojom važnošću i rijetkošću ističu se dopisnice s kraja 19. i početka 20. stoljeća s otisnutim logotipima pazinskih gospodarstvenika, dopisnice korištene u vojnoj korespondenciji kao i dopisnice koje su poslane ili naslovljene na znamenite ljude koji su djelovali u Pazinu, poput Vladimira Nazora i Saše Šantela.

en.header: Collection manager:\nIvan Smoljan, curator\nCollection insights: upon announcement
en.content: Fundus of the Collection is dated in the period between the 19th and the 21st century. It consists of items related with postal traffic such as postcards, envelopes and stamps from the Austrian and Italian reign and the period of Yugoslavia. The Collection guards several metal mailboxes from the end of the 19th and beginning of the 20th century, as well as carton boxes for postal delivery used at the beginning of the 20th century. \n\nPostcards from the end of the 19th and beginning of the 20th century stand out from the overall fundus of the Collection due to their importance and rarity. Details of the postcards, such as logos of Pazin businessmen, postcards of military correspondence and those sent from or to notable individuals who worked or lived in Pazin, such as Vladimir Nazor or Saša Šantel, make a valuable contribution to the funds of the Collection and Museum in general.
